title: Just what you're looking for! Studio The Excelsior
posting_body: ['The Excelsior', 'Visit our community today!', '4703 Coldwater Canyon Ave Studio City, CA 91604', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1799/month', 'Unit Type:', 'Studio-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', 'Call', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'No pets allowed;', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '➢ Assigned Parking', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Responsive Maintenance', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢', 'Sorry, No Pets', '➢ Controlled Access Entry', '➢ Friendly, Professional On-Site Management', '➢ Furnished Apartments Available', '➢ Outdoor Spa and Sun Deck Area', '➢ Social\xa0Area\xa0with\xa0BBQ\xa0Grill', 'Description:', 'This charming apartment community is located in a great Studio City Neighborhood between Ventura Boulevard and the Ventura Freeway.', 'The building contains unique furnished studio apartments & unfurnished two bedroom apartments that are outfitted with "Murphy Beds" which provide our Residents with added space and convenience.', 'Wonderful Studio City shopping and dining options are only minutes from The Excelsior Apartments.', 'This unit comes with:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Cable TV Ready', '➢ Dual-Paned Windows', '➢ Garbage Disposal', '➢ Gas Range', '➢ Mirrored Wardrobe Closet in Select Apartment Homes', '➢ Murphy Bed in Select Apartment Homes', '➢ New Carpet in Select Apartment Homes', '➢ Refrigerator Available to Rent', '➢ Vertical Blinds', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Sat: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Carlo, Inc', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '610DEB47F5E74E25']
